attributes.additional_details: pubs have no restrictions neither do churchs so why should weddings? Church's and pubs are stuff of people you don't know the same with super stores. Weddings are just close family and friends (people to talk to regularly) I think its only fair that is no restrictions on weddings too. If needs be make it do every guest/house hold puts a name and contact number down for track and trace
attributes.background: lift the restrictions on weddings. Pubs and churches have NO restrictions to how many people they can have so why should weddings?
